result.execSummary:
The defendant Terrance E Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Imposed and Stayed.  If revoked, defendant is eligible for the ZCI program.  If that program is completed, he may apply for early termination of probation.

miscConds.notes: Defendant must pay all outstanding fees and court obligations.  If supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.
Alcohol assessment and follow through with recommendations. No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.

Drug assessment and follow through with recommendations. No controlled substances, random UA's at discretion of agent.  Do not associate with any known drug dealers or users.  Defendant may only take medication pursuant to a prescription.

No contact with anyone named in complaint except brother (person, property, residence or family).  Defendant is to attend 3 self-help meetings per week and provide signed proof of attendance to agent.  Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.

timeConds.notes: With Huber for employment. DO NOT REPORT LATE OR UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL OR CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY REQUIRED.

charges.descr: Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams)
